hangle: 시그렌과 난 어릴 적부터 매일 붙어 다녔고
first_translate: siegren and I have been inseparable since we were young children...

hangle: 우리가 며칠 이상 떨어져 있던 건 이번이 처음이었다.
first_translate: this is our first time being apart for more than just a few days.
is that why he looks different now...?

hangle: 어쩐지 키도 조금 더 큰 것 같고,
first_translate: I think he’s gotten taller too...
and his posture seems better as well.

hangle: 헤어졌을 때보다 시그렌이 좀 더 어른스러워진 느낌이야.
first_translate: it feels like siegren has become even more mature compared to when we parted ways last time.
g-goodness me!
how did they manage to catch such a beast?
that dragon must be at least three times bigger than any other one I’ve ever seen before!

hangle: 맨 앞에 말을 탄 청년이 잡은 건가?
first_translate: did the man on horseback capture it by himself?
of course not.
fiona,

hangle: 저게 바로 네게 보여주고 싶었던 거다.
first_translate: this was what I wanted you to see all along.
really?!

hangle: 용 잡아서 보여 주겠다는 게 진담이었어요?!
first_translate: were you serious about slaying dragons?!

hangle: 당연하지. 아무리 너라도 용은 본 적이 없을 테니,
first_translate: of course!  even someone like you wouldn’t know how to kill them.
now take your time looking at this beauty.

hangle: 이런 일을 자꾸 피자 사왔으니 먹어볼래?
first_translate: do you want some pizza while you’re at it?
stop talking down to me!
catching something so big must've taken quite a bit of effort from siegren...
in any case,
the people will remember him clearly after seeing this sight.
the people will remember him clearly after seeing this sight.

hangle: 하루라도 빨리 자리를 잡아야 하는 시그렌에겐
first_translate: for someone like siegren who needs to establish himself quickly,
this isn’t bad publicity at all.
but there’s only one problem here...
but there’s only one problem here...

hangle: 난 이런 장면을 쓴 기억이 없다는 거다.
first_translate: I don’t recall writing anything like this into my story.
as goes the saying “the butterfly effect,”

hangle: 만약 이렇게 내가 예상하지 못한 상황이 계속 일어난다면…
first_translate: if unexpected events continue happening like this,
a single flap of its wings could bring forth a hurricane.
then what would happen if things get out of control?
my knowledge of this story might change completely...

hangle: 내가 모르는 전개로 전부 뒤바뀔 수도 있어.
first_translate: ...into a plotline I’m unfamiliar with.
lady fiona!
lady fiona!!!
you look healthy!
it’s great to finally meet you!

hangle: 이 녀석은 아가씨 때문에 울기까지 했다고요!
first_translate: this little boy cried because he missed you so much!
huh?
they seem to know each other.
looks like lady fiona is popular among the kids!
abel, I’ll head back now!
not going with the procession?
no, I’d rather walk.
shameless!
tsk.
what kind of nonsense is this parade anyway?

hangle: 망할 스승이 안 시켰으면 이런 짓 안 했어.
first_translate: I never would’ve done this had master not ordered me to do so.

hangle: 보나 마나 내가 싫어하는 모습을 보고 즐거워했겠지.
first_translate: obviously she enjoyed watching me suffer through this ordeal.

hangle: 이런 걸 할 바엔 다른 걸 하고 싶다고.
first_translate: rather than doing stuff like this,
I wish I could spend quality time with fiona--
siegren.
fiona...
long time no see.
so you really are living here for the time being, right?
I got worried when I didn’t find you during dinner earlier today.
yep.
it’s really her.
this isn’t a dream anymore.
are you wet?
has it started raining outside already?
I wanna hug her tightly.

hangle: 널 다시 보기 위해 어떤 노력을 했는지
first_translate: do you know how hard I worked...
...in order to see you again?
let go, siegren.

hangle: 아무리 봄이라도 계속 젖은 채로 있으면 감기 걸려.
first_translate: even though it’s springtime, you can still catch a cold if you stay soaked like that.
do I need to dry myself off properly then?
ah!
geez.
go sit over there.
just leave yourself alone and let nature run its course.
stay put.

hangle: 혼자 두면 또 대충할 거 알아.
first_translate: I know you won’t listen otherwise.
I seriously cannot trust you sometimes.

hangle: 괜히 내가 매일 따라다닌 게 아니라니까.

this guy...

hangle: 나 떠나기 전에 말도 안 걸고 그러지 않았나?

he’s not mad at me anymore, is he?
wait, aside from getting angry,

I hope he forgot about it altogether.
by the way, siegren.
wasn’t catching that dragon difficult?
not particularly.
that’s good.

hangle: 사실 넌 앞으로 그거보다 강한 용과도 더 싸울 예정이란다…

hangle: 이야기가 내가 쓴 대로 흘러간다면 말이지.

okay, that’s enough drying.
you may stand up n-- wait.
hold on.

hangle: 그 조그맣던 애가 커서 용을 다 잡다니.

why are you staring at me like that?
siegren.

but thank you very much.
you truly amaze me.
